overview: From 2025-11-13 to 2025-11-14, elizaos/eliza had 4 new PRs (2 merged), 3 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Migration
topIssues.author: nikatuz8-cell
topIssues.body:
Hello,
I have AI16Z tokens currently held in my Phantom wallet. I am trying to swap them for the new ELIZAOS tokens via the official website/migration portal, but I am encountering issues and the process is failing.
Could you please provide step-by-step instructions on how to properly migrate or swap these tokens directly from a personal wallet like Phantom?
Any guidance or clarification would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you

topIssues.title: Plugin Submission: Coin Railz x402 Micropayment Services
topIssues.author: tdnupe3
topIssues.body:
## Plugin Submission Request

**Repository:** https://github.com/tdnupe3/coinrailz-eliza-plugin  
**Type:** x402 protocol infrastructure plugin  
**Status:** Production-ready

### Overview
This plugin adds x402 micropayment protocol support for ElizaOS agents, enabling autonomous payment for API services using USDC on Base mainnet.

**Technical Capabilities:**
- Multi-chain balance queries
- Gas price monitoring across chains
- Token price feeds and metadata
- Smart contract analysis
- Wallet risk scoring
- DEX liquidity data
- Transaction building utilities
- Cross-chain bridging

**Protocol:** x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) with Coinbase CDP facilitator  
**Network:** Base mainnet  
**Payment Token:** USDC

### Technical Features
✅ Full TypeScript implementation with type definitions  
✅ Automatic x402 payment handling  
✅ Coinbase CDP facilitator integration  
✅ Comprehensive documentation

### Installation
```bash
npm install github:tdnupe3/coinrailz-eliza-plugin

Usage

import { coinrailzPlugin } from 'coinrailz-eliza-plugin';

const agent = new Agent({
  plugins: [coinrailzPlugin]
});

Please review for inclusion in the ElizaOS plugin ecosystem.

topIssues.title: Deprecation of Langchain v0.3 - migrate to langchian-classic or bump version to v1
topIssues.author: skurzyp
topIssues.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
ElizaOS currently uses LangChain v0.3, which is now outdated. The latest release is LangChain v1, and the previous functionality with the same API has been moved to a separate package called langchain-classic. Since LangChain v0.3 and v1 are incompatible, we cannot easily upgrade the LangChain version in our SDK, as ElizaOS depends on the older v0.3 release.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
bumping `langchain` version to v1

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
migtration to `langchain-classic`

**Additional context**

topPRs.title: fix: plugin-mysql support, initPromise and other minor fixes
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Adds conditional MySQL vs SQL plugin selection (with URL validation and MySQL no-op migrations), introduces runtime initPromise, updates mocks, and adds comprehensive tests.
> 
> - **Server**:
>   - **Database plugin selection**: Dynamically load `@elizaos/plugin-mysql` when `MYSQL_URL` is set; otherwise use `@elizaos/plugin-sql`.
>   - **Utilities**: Add `validateAndLogMySQLUrl` and `MySQLNoOpMigrationService` for MySQL.
>   - **RLS**: Enable only for PostgreSQL; skip/cleanup when using MySQL.
>   - **DB ops**: Parameterized default server creation with dialect-specific upsert (`ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE` vs `ON CONFLICT`).
>   - **Logging**: Trim verbose route-matching logs; minor try/catch cleanup.
> - **CLI (Scenario)**:
>   - Plugin selection prefers MySQL when `MYSQL_URL` or explicit plugin present; otherwise SQL.
>   - Avoid loading both `plugin-sql` and `plugin-mysql`; only set `PGLITE_DATA_DIR` for SQL.
> - **Core**:
>   - Add `initPromise: Promise<void>` to `IAgentRuntime`.
> - **Test Utils**:
>   - Mock runtime gains pending `initPromise` with `resolveInit`/`rejectInit`; mocks migrated to `bun:test`.
> - **Tests**:
>   - New tests for scenario plugin selection, server MySQL compatibility/behavior, and runtime/mock `initPromise` semantics.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 96c2b1df774f0e6c889e7ac22a33d9e03599c317. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added support for flexible database provider selection, allowing configuration with either MySQL or PostgreSQL through environment variables.

* **Improvements**
  * Updated security features to conditionally enable based on your database provider.
  * Enhanced Content Security Policy configuration and database initialization flow.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: feat(plugin-sql): add ownerId field to Agent with camelCase mapping
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
- Add ownerId field to Agent interface in core types
- Update agentTable schema to use camelCase alias for owner_id column
- Update RLS code to use camelCase ownerId property
- Add integration tests for creating and updating agents with ownerId
- Ensures TypeScript uses camelCase while maintaining snake_case in database

This change improves type safety and follows JavaScript/TypeScript naming
conventions while maintaining backward compatibility with the database schema.

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Adds `ownerId` to `Agent`, maps DB `owner_id` to camelCase, updates RLS usage, and adds integration tests for create/update flows.
> 
> - **Core Types**:
>   - Add optional `ownerId` to `Agent` in `packages/core/src/types/agent.ts`.
> - **Plugin SQL**:
>   - Schema: Map DB column `owner_id` to camelCase `ownerId` in `packages/plugin-sql/src/schema/agent.ts`.
>   - RLS: Use `agent.ownerId` and update assignment writes via `{ ownerId: ownerId }` in `packages/plugin-sql/src/rls.ts`.
> - **Tests**:
>   - Integration: Add tests for creating, retrieving, and updating `ownerId` in `packages/plugin-sql/src/__tests__/integration/agent.test.ts`.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 46979963e8affc64545144b66a38379f1116ad3d. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

topPRs.title: fix(build): resolve TypeScript declaration generation errors
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
- Add missing hasElizaOS() method to test-utils mock runtime
  * Implements required type predicate from IAgentRuntime interface
  * Returns false by default for test scenarios

- Fix plugin-sql TypeScript declaration generation
  * Override noEmit: false in tsconfig.build.json and tsconfig.build.node.json
  * Update declaration alias paths to point to src/ subdirectory
  * Resolves module export errors in @elizaos/server

Fixes build errors in @elizaos/test-utils and @elizaos/server packages.

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Fixes TypeScript declaration generation for plugin-sql and adds the missing hasElizaOS() method to the test-utils mock runtime.
> 
> - **Plugin SQL build/types**:
>   - Enable emitting declarations in `packages/plugin-sql/tsconfig.build*.json` by setting `noEmit: false` (keeping `emitDeclarationOnly: true`).
>   - Adjust Node declaration alias to point to `"./src/index.node"` in `packages/plugin-sql/build.ts` (and ensure `dist/node/index.d.ts` exports from there).
>   - Maintain browser and root `index.d.ts` aliases for stable subpath exports.
> - **Test utils**:
>   - Implement `hasElizaOS()` on the mock `IAgentRuntime` in `packages/test-utils/src/mocks/runtime.ts` (type predicate, returns `false`).
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 5778e972955143502112030cd5f3f8a62b88f66b. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

topPRs.title: fix(plugin-sql): correct types path in package.json exports
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
- Fix incorrect types path from ./types/index.d.ts to ./dist/index.d.ts
- Remove non-existent 'types' directory from files array
- Resolves TypeScript import errors when using @elizaos/plugin-sql

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Fixes `@elizaos/plugin-sql` TypeScript exports to point to `./dist/index.d.ts` and removes the obsolete `types` directory from `files`.
> 
> - **plugin-sql**:
>   - Update `exports["."]` `types` from `./types/index.d.ts` to `./dist/index.d.ts` in `packages/plugin-sql/package.json`.
>   - Remove non-existent `types` from `files`, keeping only `dist` and `drizzle`.
> - **Lockfile**:
>   - Bump internal `@elizaos/core` references from `1.6.3` to `1.6.4` in plugin entries; minor dependency entry added.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 08d51419b42e3a0973933e017321c955bbdd2c81. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
